name: Symbioun
description:
Formed by the merger of Institute of Computing (instcomp.com) and Saka Solutions, SymbiounÂ is a premium provider of software solutions for business processes including process design, system architecture, design & development, and testing services. Following an agile model of development (Scrum methodology), Symbioun provides offshore development as well as consulting staff onsite in the US.
We are specialists in the areas of mobile solutions in J2ME, Symbian with web and server side development in J2EE, Microsoft .NET and Open source solutions in PHP and Ruby on Rails. We provide transparent execution to our clients through a shared project management tool and content management system. We work on Time & Material as well as Fixed Project Cost modes.
READ MORE...
